Konica Minolta Network Printers on Mac OS X

27 October 2011

Jacobs University Bremen replaced its network printers on October 27, 2011.
Here are the steps to setup the new Konica Minolta Multi Function Printers:

Download and Install the C652Series Driver →

Goto System Preferences → Print & Scan If you don’t have the qpilot setup already, follow these instructions →

Change the address to CAMPUSNETUSERNAME@qpilot.jacobs-university.de if your mac userID is not your campusNet userID

Goto Options & Supplies → Driver. Select Printer Software in Print Using: and setup the settings as shown below:

Enabled Double Sided Printing:

Enable Double Sided Stapling:
